hypothesis_content.title: Political Memecoin (TRUMP) Decoupling During BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in tight range (±2% over 48 hours) during NEUTRAL regime, TRUMP memecoin will decouple and move >20% independently within next 3 days based on political news flow, with positive news causing outperformance vs BTC and negative news causing underperformance, regardless of general crypto direction.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Political memecoins have fundamental drivers orthogonal to crypto markets. During BTC consolidation, attention shifts to idiosyncratic factors. TRUMP has shown consistent sensitivity to political developments with measurable news impact.
entry_conditions: Political news volume (Trump-related) increases >50% from 7-day average

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC breaks out of consolidation with >3% move and TRUMP fails to follow

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: TRUMP remains tightly correlated with BTC despite political news or fails to react to significant political developments.
